locations: The Mirror of Kalandra (Reflection of Kalandra)

crafting.name: Fractured Item Crafting
crafting.description: Crafting on items with valuable fractured mods
crafting.strategy: Buy items with valuable fractured mods (e.g., T1 life, high physical damage). Craft using essences or fossils to add complementary mods. The fractured mod cannot be changed, providing a guaranteed high-tier mod.

crafting.name: Harvest Reforge Crafting
crafting.description: Using Harvest reforge crafts to target specific mod types
crafting.strategy: Buy good item bases. Use Harvest reforge crafts to target specific mod types (e.g., "Reforge with Physical modifiers" on weapons). Combine with metamods for more deterministic results.

crafting.name: Awakener Orb Crafting
crafting.description: Combining two influenced items to create a double-influenced item
materials: Two influenced items with desired mods
crafting.strategy: Buy two influenced items with desired mods (e.g., item with T1 life and item with explode mod). Use Awakener's Orb to destroy the first item and transfer its influence mod to the second item. Results in a double-influenced item with both mods.

crafting.name: Fossil Crafting
crafting.description: Using specific fossil combinations to target valuable mod pools
crafting.strategy: Buy good item bases (e.g., Astral Plate, Vaal Regalia). Use fossil combinations to target specific mod pools. For example, Pristine+Jagged+Dense for physical damage reduction and life on armor.

crafting.name: Meta-mod Crafting
crafting.description: Using "Prefixes/Suffixes Cannot Be Changed" with other crafting methods
crafting.strategy: Craft an item with good prefixes or suffixes. Apply "Prefixes/Suffixes Cannot Be Changed" metamod. Use Harvest reforge, Veiled Chaos Orbs, or other methods to safely modify the other half of the item without risking the good mods.

crafting.name: Cluster Jewel Crafting
crafting.description: Crafting high-demand cluster jewels with specific notables
crafting.strategy: Buy 8-passive Large Cluster Jewels with good bases (e.g., Critical, Elemental Damage). Use Alteration+Regal or Chaos spam to hit valuable notable combinations. Focus on meta builds for best returns.

crafting.name: Recombinator Crafting
crafting.description: Using recombinators to merge mods from two items
crafting.strategy: Buy or craft two items with complementary mods. Use recombinators to merge them, with a chance to get both sets of mods on a single item. Can create otherwise impossible mod combinations.

crafting.name: Eldritch Currency Crafting
crafting.description: Using Eldritch currency to craft powerful implicit modifiers
crafting.strategy: Buy item bases with good explicit modifiers. Apply Eldritch currency to add powerful implicit modifiers. Focus on meta combinations like spell suppression, elemental damage, or life regeneration.

crafting.name: Essence Crafting
crafting.description: Using high-tier essences to craft meta items
crafting.strategy: Buy influenced item bases (e.g., Fingerless Silk Gloves, Two-Toned Boots). Apply Deafening Essences to guarantee one mod and hope for good influenced mods. Focus on meta builds for best returns.

crafting.name: Veiled Chaos Orb Crafting
crafting.description: Using Veiled Chaos Orbs to get powerful veiled modifiers
crafting.strategy: Buy influenced item bases. Apply Veiled Chaos Orbs to reroll the item with a guaranteed veiled modifier. Unveil to select powerful mods like "Trigger a Socketed Spell when you Use a Skill".
